column1: 21:57|The only two items that stood out on the whole list for Cork were two calls placed from the home of Wilfred Lipinksi
column3: one at 9:57 P.M. and another at 10:41 P.M. If Lipinski had teenagers who knew about the party at Valhalla
column4: the calls would not have been odd
column5: but all the Lipinski children were long ago grown and gone
column6: and so Cork wondered.|Blood Hollow|William Kent Krueger

column2: the inset clock blinks from 21:57 to 21:58. Napier's eyes sink
column3: newborn sunshine slants through ancient oaks and on a lost river. Look

column1: 21:57|"The waiting man pulled out a handsome watch
column2: the lids of it set with small diamonds. ""Three minutes to ten
